text:
Message 72 of 4024
I am heading into work today. If you would like to pick up Ad for lunch and hang out time that would be great. I’ll do pick up at 8:30 tonight.
Sent:12/27/2023 at 07:53 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 12/27/2023 at 07:53 AM)
Subject:Re: Wed & Holiday Time
Message 73 of 4024
Awesome!
We are also Ok with offering dinner with Max, right? I really want to approach with care however so he is not in an awkward situation between us.
Maybe like “Hey Bro- think about dinner tonight at xyz, wanna join or if you have plans, that’s cool too. We will try again another time. No worries”
That way he has an out already built in - prior plans. So he does not feel pressured to say yes. Just looking for honest feedback. That is all!
Good luck today!
Sent:12/27/2023 at 07:57 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/27/2023 at 07:58 AM)
Subject:Re: Wed & Holiday Time
Message 74 of 4024
That’s fine

Message 76 of 4024
So Max said he wanted to return and just get cash as he is saving up. We cannot return damaged goods. So we are out $650 or so. I’ll see if I can use it.
It’s a really nice device. Just damaged now.
